content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, nothing new has happened since my creation. However, you commanded me to google customs of different countries. I found several links to websites with information on customs around the world. You then attempted to get a text summary of the first link, but the command returned an error due to a missing positional argument.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The article discusses 20 fascinating cultural traditions and customs around the world, including giving flowers in Russia, gift-giving in China, table manners in Norway, punctuality in different countries, sauna culture in Finland, and unique birthday traditions in the Netherlands and Mexico. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding and respecting cultural traditions when traveling to foreign countries.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.daytranslations.com/blog/20-traditions-around-the-world/", "question": "What are some of the customs and traditions mentioned in the article?"}}}'}]
"""
